list_definition.definition: favouring/favoring of one or other (side in an argument etc) rather than remaining neutral

list_definition.definition: a weight on or in an object (eg a bowl for playing bowls) making it move in a particular direction.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was biased by the report in the newspapers
Which factors could bias the results of the experiment?
